00046   class Key {
00047   public:
00048 
00049     static const uint8_t HAVE_REVISION  = 0x80;
00050     static const uint8_t HAVE_TIMESTAMP = 0x40;
00051     static const uint8_t AUTO_TIMESTAMP = 0x20;
00052     static const uint8_t REV_IS_TS      = 0x10;
00053 
00054     static const char *END_ROW_MARKER;
00055     static const char *END_ROOT_ROW;
00056 
00057     static inline void encode_ts64(uint8_t **bufp, int64_t val) {
00058       val = ~val;
00059 #ifdef HT_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00060       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 56);
00061       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 48);
00062       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 40);
00063       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 32);
00064       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 24);
00065       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 16);
00066       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 8);
00067       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)val;
00068 #else
00069       memcpy(*bufp, &val, 8);
00070       *bufp += 8;
00071 #endif
00072     }
00073 
00074     static inline int64_t decode_ts64(const uint8_t **bufp) {
00075       int64_t val;
00076 #ifdef HT_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00077       val = ((int64_t)*(*bufp)++ << 56);
00078       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 48);
00079       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 40);
00080       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 32);
00081       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 24);
00082       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 16);
00083       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00084       val |= *(*bufp)++;
00085 #else
00086       memcpy(&val, *bufp, 8);
00087       *bufp += 8;
00088 #endif
00089       return ~val;
00090     }
00091 
00095     Key() : row(0), column_qualifier(0), timestamp(0), revision(AUTO_ASSIGN),
00096         column_family_code(0), flag(FLAG_INSERT) { }
00097 
00104     Key(SerializedKey key);
00105 
00112     bool load(SerializedKey key);
00113     inline size_t len_row() const {
00114       return(strlen(row) + 1);
00115     }
00116     inline size_t len_column_family() const {
00117       return(column_qualifier - row);
00118     }
00119     inline size_t len_cell() const {
00120       return((column_qualifier - row) + strlen(column_qualifier) + 1);
00121     }
00122 
00123     SerializedKey  serial;
00124     uint32_t       length;
00125

00127     const char    *column_qualifier;

00129     int64_t        timestamp;
00130     int64_t        revision;
00131     uint8_t        column_family_code;
00132     uint8_t        flag;
00133     uint8_t        control;
00134   };
